description.para:
Methods for playing Effect
Since 1.15, these should work on EffectSound as well

briefdescription.para: Play an Effect.

simplesect.para: As the Effect is automatically registered, it will not be freed automatically (because of the ref) Unless 'SetAutodestroy(true)' is called on the created 'Effect', which will clean it up when the sound stop Alternatively, SEffectManager.DestroyEffect can be called manually, which will also unregister and cleanup

parameterdescription.para: Effect The Effect to play
vector The position to play the Effect

simplesect.para: int The registered ID of the Effect

memberdef.argsstring: (notnull Effect eff, Object obj, vector local_pos="0 0 0", vector local_ori="0 0 0", bool force_rotation_relative_to_world=false)
memberdef.name: PlayOnObject

briefdescription.para: Play an Effect.

simplesect.para: Read PlayInWorld warning

parameterdescription.para: Effect The Effect to play
Object The parent of the Effect
vector The local position to play the Effect in relation to the parent (Optional)
vector The local orientation to play the Effect in relation to the parent (Optional)
bool Whether to force the orientation to stay in WS (Optional)

simplesect.para: int The registered ID of the Effect

briefdescription.para: Stops the Effect.

parameterdescription.para: int The ID of the Effect to Stop

memberdef.argsstring: (string sound_set, vector position, float play_fade_in=0, float stop_fade_out=0, bool loop=false, bool enviroment=false)
memberdef.name: CreateSound

briefdescription.para: Create an EffectSound.

simplesect.para: Read PlayInWorld warning

parameterdescription.para: string The sound set name of the sound
vector The position to play the sound
float The fade in duration of the sound (Optional)
float The fade out duration of the sound (Optional)
bool Whether the sound should loop (Optional)
bool Whether to set environment variables (Optional)

simplesect.para: EffectSound The created EffectSound

memberdef.argsstring: (string sound_set, vector position, float play_fade_in=0, float stop_fade_out=0, bool loop=false)
memberdef.name: PlaySound

briefdescription.para: Create and play an EffectSound.

simplesect.para: Calls CreateSound, read CreateSound warning

parameterdescription.para: string The sound set name of the sound
vector The position to play the sound
float The fade in duration of the sound (Optional)
float The fade out duration of the sound (Optional)
bool Whether the sound should loop (Optional)

simplesect.para: EffectSound The created EffectSound

memberdef.argsstring: (notnull SoundParams params, vector position, float play_fade_in=0, float stop_fade_out=0, bool loop=false)
memberdef.name: PlaySoundParams

briefdescription.para: Create and play an EffectSound.

simplesect.para: Calls CreateSound, read CreateSound warning

parameterdescription.para: SoundParams Params to create the sound with
vector The position to play the sound
float The fade in duration of the sound (Optional)
float The fade out duration of the sound (Optional)
bool Whether the sound should loop (Optional)

simplesect.para: EffectSound The created EffectSound

memberdef.argsstring: (string sound_set, vector position, float play_fade_in=0, float stop_fade_out=0, bool loop=false)
memberdef.name: PlaySoundCachedParams

briefdescription.para: Create and play an EffectSound, using or creating cached SoundParams.

simplesect.para: Calls CreateSound, read CreateSound warning

parameterdescription.para: string The sound set name of the sound
vector The position to play the sound
float The fade in duration of the sound (Optional)
float The fade out duration of the sound (Optional)
bool Whether the sound should loop (Optional)

simplesect.para: EffectSound The created EffectSound

memberdef.argsstring: (string sound_set, vector position, float play_fade_in=0, float stop_fade_out=0, bool loop=false)
memberdef.name: PlaySoundEnviroment

briefdescription.para: Create and play an EffectSound, updating environment variables.

simplesect.para: Calls CreateSound, read CreateSound warning

parameterdescription.para: string The sound set name of the sound
vector The position to play the sound
float The fade in duration of the sound (Optional)
float The fade out duration of the sound (Optional)
bool Whether the sound should loop (Optional)

simplesect.para: EffectSound The created EffectSound

memberdef.argsstring: (string sound_set, Object parent_object, float play_fade_in=0, float stop_fade_out=0, bool loop=false)
memberdef.name: PlaySoundOnObject

briefdescription.para: Create and play an EffectSound.

simplesect.para: Calls CreateSound, read CreateSound warning

parameterdescription.para: string The sound set name of the sound
Object The parent Object for the sound to follow
float The fade in duration of the sound (Optional)
float The fade out duration of the sound (Optional)
bool Whether the sound should loop (Optional)

simplesect.para: EffectSound The created EffectSound

briefdescription.para: Unregisters, stops and frees the Effect.

parameterdescription.para: EffectSound The EffectSound to free

briefdescription.para: Checks whether an Effect ID is registered in SEffectManager.

parameterdescription.para: int The Effect ID to check

simplesect.para: bool Whether there is an Effect registered for this ID

briefdescription.para: Gets the Effect with the given registered Effect ID.

parameterdescription.para: int The Effect ID

simplesect.para: Effect The Effect registered to the ID or null

briefdescription.para: Registers Effect in SEffectManager.

simplesect.para: Already handled in SEffectManager Create/Play methods
This will make SEffectManager hold a strong ref for the Effect

parameterdescription.para: Effect The Effect to register

simplesect.para: int The Effect ID

briefdescription.para: Unregisters Effect in SEffectManager.

simplesect.para: Will automatically occur on stop when the Effect is AutoDestroy
ID can be gotten from the Effect by calling Effect.GetID
Generic Play methods will also return the ID

parameterdescription.para: int The ID of the Effect to unregister

briefdescription.para: Unregisters Effect in SEffectManager.

parameterdescription.para: Effect The Effect to unregister

briefdescription.para: Helper function for EffectRegister to decide an Effect ID.

simplesect.para: int A currently unused Effect ID

briefdescription.para: Legacy, backwards compatibility.

parameterdescription.para: EffectSound The EffectSound to free

simplesect.para: bool A bool which is always true

briefdescription.para: Get or create a cached SoundParams object.

parameterdescription.para: string The sound set name of the sound

simplesect.para: SoundParams The cached SoundParams for the given soundset

description.para: Various events that can be overriden for custom behaviour

briefdescription.para: Event called from EffectSound.Event_OnSoundWaveEnded.

simplesect.para: Every registered sound is registered to call this

parameterdescription.para: EffectSound The EffectSound calling the event

briefdescription.para: Event called on frame.

simplesect.para: Called from MissionGameplay.OnUpdate
Effects register themselves by Effect.SetEnableEventFrame(true)
EffectSound is automatically registered

parameterdescription.para: float Time passed since the previous frame

briefdescription.para: Initialize the containers.

simplesect.para: This is done this way, to have these not exist on server

briefdescription.para: Cleanup method to properly clean up the static data.

simplesect.para: Will be called when MissionBase is destroyed

memberdef.type: protected ref map< int, ref Effect >
memberdef.definition: protected ref map<int, ref Effect> SEffectManager::m_EffectsMap
memberdef.name: m_EffectsMap

briefdescription.para: Static map of all registered effects <id, Effect>
Static array of IDs that were previously used, but freed up by unregistering.
Counter for quickly getting the next ID if FreeEffectIDs array is empty.
As the counter starts at 1, Effect ID can never be 0.
Bool to check whether Cleanup is happening, which means that the maps should no longer be accessed.
Bool to check whether Init was called.

memberdef.type: protected ref map< string, ref SoundParams >
memberdef.definition: protected ref map<string, ref SoundParams> SEffectManager::m_ParamsMap
memberdef.name: m_ParamsMap

briefdescription.para: Static map of cached sound params, to prevent having to recreate them.
Static invoker for the SEffectManager.Event_OnFrameUpdate called form MissionGameplay.OnUpdate.
Manager class for managing Effect (EffectParticle, EffectSound)

simplesect.para: Keeps a ref to any Effect registered (Created/Played), make sure to perform the necessary cleanup
